summary: App to track and manage the user's daily goals.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist app logo mark with a checkmark and sun motif, warm neutral palette (daily-goals-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft illustrated empty-state scene (desk/journal/checklist), warm tones, lots of whitespace (empty-goals-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Subtle repeating background pattern (dots/lines) in light warm gray (warm-pattern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and ensure all goal data is scoped per authenticated user principal (unauthenticated users should be prompted to sign in before viewing or editing goals).
Create the core frontend screens for daily goals: Today dashboard (checklist), Goals management (create/edit/archive), and a simple History view to review past daysâ€™ completions.
Wire the frontend to the backend using React Query for fetching/mutating goals and daily completion, including loading, empty, and error states for each screen.
Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across all screens; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add generated static image assets to the frontend and display them in the UI (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an app for setting, tracking, and managing daily goals.
Add backend support for managing daily goals: create, read (list), update, and archive goals, including stable persistence across canister upgrades.
Add backend support for tracking daily completion for goals by calendar date (user can check/uncheck a goal for a given day) and retrieving a day view of completion statuses.
